body_html:
@fanyangxyz, open ptb_word_lm.py and modify the header changing from tensorflow.models.rnn.ptb import reader to just import reader, there maybe some issue in your environment settings.

I got the same problem, but fix it using the trick above. Hope this help.
body_text:
@fanyangxyz, open ptb_word_lm.py and modify the header changing from tensorflow.models.rnn.ptb import reader to just import reader, there maybe some issue in your environment settings.
I got the same problem, but fix it using the trick above. Hope this help.
body:
@fanyangxyz, open ptb_word_lm.py and modify the header changing `from tensorflow.models.rnn.ptb import reader` to just `import reader`, there maybe some issue in your environment settings.

I got the same problem, but fix it using the trick above. Hope this help.
